parameters.query:
INSERT INTO audit_logs (
  tenant_id, workflow_name, request_id, action,
  payload_masked, risk_level, status, error_message, metadata
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.tenantId }}',
  '{{ $json.workflowName }}',
  '{{ $json.requestId }}',
  'auth_gate_blocked',
  '{{ JSON.stringify({ token_provided: $json.tokenProvided, source_ip: $json.sourceIp }) }}'::jsonb,
  'HIGH',
  'error',
  '{{ $json.errorMessage }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify({ reason: $json.reason, validated_at: $json.validatedAt }) }}'::jsonb
);
